page.title: 10A FARMER'S LIFE IN TOTLAND
page.content: Farmers wake up early in the morning to milk the cows.It takes about half an hour to one hour to milk 12 cows. After they've milked the cows they have their breakfast.It's usually 7:15am when they have finished milking the cows,then they feed the hens.The animals they keep are:_pigs;cows;hens; sheep and a sheep dog.Farmers grow potatoes,wheat,sugar beet and corn. Sometimes sheep catch sheepscab,that is a disease caused by very tiny insects.The sheep have to be put through a special kind of bath every now and again.The farmer is a nice person who knows his work very well. There are a few farms in our area.One of them is Sheepwash Farm and the other is Warren Farm. Leigh Johnson 9 years
